thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1898
thread.title: Lindsey

author: Lindsey
title: Lindsey
text: FlightHub's website was easy to navigate and gave the best price for round-trip tickets. The results for my flight search were fast and easy to read. I was also able to get a great deal on my car rental. FlightHub emailed my e-tickets and car rental information within 2 minutes of my reservations. I am impressed and will use FlightHub again for another trip. Thank you!
